file_content.text: He's found us! It's too late! He's here! He found us!
Did he show up in person? Talk to me, Anuli.
Is the Eidolon there?
He's a specter! You can't escape a specter! We're all dead!
Get out of there! Move it!
Run, Anuli!
Nowhere to run! He'll find you! He always finds you! We're all dead!
Let me talk to your boss, find out what's happening.
Where's Gele'ren?
He's gone! It all happened so fast! What are they? Where did they come from?
Get away! Get away from me!
Mako! No! Aaarrrgh--
We have to get there! We have to save him!
Time to take out the Eidolon.
At least we know where he is.
We're coming, Anuli!
I'm not walking into a trap.
That's what the Eidolon wants.
But it's the Eidolon! You need to kill him!
Your friend is dead already.
It's too late.
You don't know that! And it's the Eidolon! You need to kill him!
That's the job. That's what we're going to do.
Don't worry, I will.
I'm not going there unprepared.
We can't act blindly.
Let's just hurry! Please!
Hang on, Anuli. We're coming.
Don't start trying to give orders, Mako.
I call the damn shots!
But--Anuli needs my help....
No! Aaarrrghhh--
We got Eidolon Security's files. All of them. Didn't think we could, but we did.
Network Access is the place to be. It all happens there. The galaxy is information. Network Access is the center of the galaxy.
The hunter met Zee. "The" Zee. I probably would've fainted. Wow.
Meeting Zee would be an honor. He's a genius. One of a kind. Lucky, lucky, lucky.
Mako's happy. She said they'd never have found the Ugnaughts without me. She said I did good.
Had to tell the hunter about the Ugnaughts. Now the hunter knows. I promised Mako I would. I promised her.
We all felt the explosion. Shook the whole building. Probably killed a lot of vrblthers. That's a good thing.
The upper industrial zone is dangerous. Vrblthers eat anything they find. Nasty. It's a bad place.
